home.welcome-message:
This website has the goal to provide a free tool for everyone to search for public resources stored on the Blockchain.
You can check if a local road, bridge, public building or any other public resource is being inspected periodically and verify it's current state.
Keep in mind that not all resources are stored on the Blockchain.
